biography: A familiar face within the Hector Trophée circuit, Joakim is known for his calm demeanor and strategic approach to the game. While details about his home club remain undisclosed, his dedication to golf is evident through his participation in the Hector Trophée.

Having participated in the tournament once, Joakim brings a level of experience that is valuable in the pairs format. Although he is still looking for his first victory at the Hector Trophée, and has yet to take home the Victor Trophy, his consistent play suggests that he is always a contender.

While Joakim is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, fans know that the world of golf is ever-changing, and a last-minute entry is always a possibility. His presence at the event is always appreciated.
